TopicTitle: 2.5m to multiple 2.5m bi-, tri-, and quadcouplers

Articles.Content: So, KSP has 1.25m to multiple 1.25m couplers and 2.5m to multiple 1.25m couplers. I'm thinking we need 2.5m to multiple 2.5m couplers. You know, just because.

i dont know.. why id like to have it lower my part count (which is always a good thing) i think it would be just too big. it would have to look different from the 1.25m versions. maybe if it were flatter and looked more like a framework of trusses?
We should be able to adjust the tank size to our needs Length , width , height , thickness, material and fill up our boosters the way we want , for a variable thrust effect

We should be able to adjust the tank size to our needs Length , width , height , thickness, material and fill up our boosters the way we want , for a variable thrust effect

How does this have anything to do with OP's suggestion?

Also, I approve of this suggestion!
